name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Aaushniya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), perform all of the following according to the Arms on your (VC).・Right Deity Arms‐This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.・Left Deity Arms‐[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: When the sun and moon cross paths, a bright future awaits the world.

name: Blaze Maiden, Amelia
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose up to one unit card with "Nirvana" in its card name from your hand, and ride it as [Stand]. If you rode, you cannot ride by card effects until end of turn.
flavor: Thus, the prayers will strike the heavens, and the dragon of Chakrabarthi will be reborn.

name: Desire Devil, Dofund
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", you may [Soul-Charge 2].[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your soul has two or more "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: It's D-D-D-D-D-D-D-D-Dofund!

name: Diabolos Madonna, Meagan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Do you want to know why I am known as the battering ram?

name: Cardinal Dominus, Orfist Regis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose up to one World card from your hand or drop, and put it into your Order Zone.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and for every two World cards in your Order Zone, call up to one Shadow Army token to (RC), and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. (If there are four World cards, [Power] +10000)
flavor: On this night of darkness, we shall prepare our blades for battle.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Launcher Charleen
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle that this unit attacked, your opponent cannot call normal units from hand to (GC), and cannot play Blitz orders from hand.[CONT](RC):If the number of your opponent's cards imprisoned in your Prison is five or less, this unit cannot attack.
flavor: The lovely ace, known for her overwhelming arrest rate.

name: Gravidia Peters
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, choose up to two Meteorite cards from your drop, and put them on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you put two cards, retire this unit, and draw a card.
flavor: To fulfill our purpose; that is the reason that we exist.

name: Heavenly Command Dragon, Exalute Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Bard of the Heavenly Instrument, Lutente", call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A world filled with heavenly light will guide us along the way.

name: Dead Sea Spiritualist, Grave゠Zorga
effect: [CONT](VC):If you did Alchemagic this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Discard a card from your hand], choose a normal order from your drop, put it into your hand, and until end of turn, when you would play a normal order, you can bind a normal order with a different card name from your drop, and Alchemagic. (Combine the costs, and add the effect to the back!)
flavor: My magic can reveal the secrets of souls... With it, I shall have you unveil them.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Armadi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other unit attacks from the back row, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], and that attacking unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Rolling towards a brighter tomorrow.

name: Blaze Battle Monk, Koukan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, if you have a unit in the [overDress] state, draw a card.
flavor: How about you have a taste of this next?

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Idahm
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each Arms card on your (VC).
flavor: Prayers that sought destruction became the resolution that struggles against despair.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Samsara
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit gets all of the following according to the Arms on your (VC).・Right Deity Arms‐[Power] +5000 during your turn.・Left Deity Arms‐"Intercept"
flavor: The sun and moon oppose each other and become the light which shines upon this world.

name: Blaze Covert Monk, Kageri
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Don't worry! You guys will be able to do it for sure!

name: Cure Flare Dracokid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if the attacking unit's [Critical] is 2 or greater, and its [Critical] is increased by a non-trigger effect ability or its original [Critical] is 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: A small, soothing fire that won't lose even to strong winds.

name: Diabolos Diver, Emmett
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards with "Bruce" in its card name, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you chose a grade 4 unit, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: I'll definitely snatch victory with these hands. This is merely a stepping stone for that.

name: Diabolos Boys, Nile
effect: [CONT](GC):If an attack hit your vanguard with "Bruce" in its card name this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000.
flavor: I've already seen that attack pattern from earlier.

name: Desire Devil, Xitto
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put from (RC) into your soul by your vanguard's ability, choose a card from your drop, and put it into your soul.
flavor: Ahh, how frustrating. It's so unsatisfying to be unable to take you down with me.

name: Brilliant Floral, Uania
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if the attacking unit's [Critical] is 2 or greater, and its [Critical] is increased by a non-trigger effect ability or its original [Critical] is 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I'll share some of my power with you. So don't die, okay?

name: Cardinal Fang, Dadai
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call a Shadow Army token to (RC).
flavor: Trample and break, together with the earth.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Barrage Ltra
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your opponent's unit is retired from (RC) or (GC) during the battle this unit attacked, imprison that retired card in your Prison.
flavor: I'll send all the bad guys that get in my way to prison!

name: Gravidia Marut
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, choose up to one Meteorite card from your hand, and put it into your Order Zone. If you put a card, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: You dare oppose us? That is a foolish act equivalent to spitting at the heavens.

name: Cardinal Principal, Regio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your Shadow Army token is retired from (RC) during your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I don't forget my allies who have passed, since they become a part of my power.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Horn Apricot
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a vanguard with "Seraph" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], your opponent chooses a trigger unit from their drop, and imprisons it in your Prison.
flavor: Fweet! Rule violations will not be tolerated!

name: Whistling Arrow of Recursion, Obifold
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if the attacking unit's [Critical] is 2 or greater, and its [Critical] is increased by a non-trigger effect ability or its original [Critical] is 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: By reversing the power of destruction, a momentary rebirth can be performed.

name: Heavenly Judgment of Composition, Heathcourt
effect: [CONT](RC):If a grade 3 was revealed for your drive check this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) during your opponent's turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 3 card from your drop other than "Heavenly Judgment of Composition, Heathcourt", and put it into your hand.
flavor: So, you have chosen to approach me? Interesting!

name: Heavenly Sickle of Pulsation, Repodron
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your other grade 3 or greater units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Now's the moment to give it your all. Show me what you've got!

name: Tetrafavor Sorceress
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if this unit was boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: If I'm together with you, we should be able to grab hold of a beautiful future.

name: Bard of the Heavenly Instrument, Lutente
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a grade 3 or greater unit, if you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: A holy tune echoes from the great heavens.

name: Heartiness Tear Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if the attacking unit's [Critical] is 2 or greater, and its [Critical] is increased by a non-trigger effect ability or its original [Critical] is 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Wrap your pains in tears and forget them!

name: Longing Maid
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][discard an order card from your hand], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Master, oh Master... Ah, where is my Master?

name: Explorer of the Grand Ravine, C. K. Sakatt
effect: [CONT]Back Row Middle (RC):This unit can intercept from the back row.[AUTO]:When this unit intercepts from the back row, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Quite interesting! Allow me to make some observations!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Kamapuu
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each grade 2 or greater unit in your back row.
flavor: Peacefully raised while being surrounded by kindness.

name: Alchemic Hedgehog
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if the attacking unit's [Critical] is 2 or greater, and its [Critical] is increased by a non-trigger effect ability or its original [Critical] is 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I think I may have created soap bubbles that won't pop!

name: Clouded Miasma
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Choose a grade 3 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC). If this is part of Alchemagic, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.
flavor: Paint over this life while entwined with an unquenchable thirst.

name: Sealed Blaze Sword, Prithivih
effect: Right Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra"Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO](VC):When the unit Armed with this card attacks, that Armed unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, if your opponent's damage zone has four or less cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 2 & put this card into your drop], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and deal one damage.

name: Sealed Blaze Shield, Swayanbuh
effect: Left Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra"Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When the unit Armed with this card is attacked, that Armed unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Sealed Blaze Spear, Aadhitya
effect: Right Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra"Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]![AUTO](VC):When this card is Armed, draw a card, and you may play an additional Arms card this turn.[CONT](VC):During your turn, the unit Armed with this card gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: 前河悠一

name: Sealed Blaze Gun, Chandra
effect: Left Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra"Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]![AUTO](VC):When the unit Armed with this card attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and the Armed unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this card into your drop.
flavor: 前河悠一

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Aaushniya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), perform all of the following according to the Arms on your (VC).・Right Deity Arms‐This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.・Left Deity Arms‐[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).
